name: video-roll
description: Rotate, zoom, reposition, stretch, flip, tune, focus and filter videos
author: Gomi

scripts.watch:entry: bun run parcel watch src/capture/capture.html src/popup/index.html src/player/player.html src/inject/index.ts src/background/index.ts src/options/index.html src/offscreen/offscreen.html src/sidepanel/sidepanel.html --no-cache --no-hmr
scripts.watch:dist: bun run wait-for-dist && bun run scripts/watchDist.js
scripts.wait-for-dist: wait-on dist/background/index.js dist/inject/index.js dist/manifest.json dist/offscreen/offscreen.html && sleep 1
scripts.dev:parallel: bun-tasks --raw watch:entry ::: watch:manifest-chromium ::: build:manifest-chromium ::: watch:dist --args BROWSER="chromium" ::: dev:uno
scripts.dev:serial: bun run clean && bun run copy:static
scripts.dev:chromium: bun run dev:clean-copy && bun run dev:parallel
scripts.dev:firefox: bun run clean && bun run copy:static && concurrently "bun run watch:entry" "bun run watch:manifest-firefox" "bun run build:manifest-firefox" "cross-env BROWSER="firefox" bun run watch:dist" "bun run dev:uno"
scripts.build:offscreen: bun run parcel build src/offscreen/offscreen.html --dist-dir dist/offscreen/ --no-source-maps --no-content-hash
scripts.build:popup: bun run parcel build src/popup/index.html --dist-dir dist/popup/ --no-source-maps --no-content-hash
scripts.build:inject: bun run parcel build src/inject/index.ts --dist-dir dist/inject --no-source-maps --no-content-hash
scripts.build:background: bun run parcel build src/background/index.ts --dist-dir dist/background --no-source-maps --no-content-hash
scripts.build:options: bun run parcel build src/options/index.html --dist-dir dist/options --no-source-maps --no-content-hash
scripts.build:capture: bun run parcel build src/capture/capture.html --dist-dir dist/capture --no-source-maps --no-content-hash
scripts.build:player: bun run parcel build src/player/player.html --dist-dir dist/player --no-source-maps --no-content-hash
scripts.build:sidepanel: bun run parcel build src/sidepanel/sidepanel.html --dist-dir dist/sidepanel --no-source-maps --no-content-hash
scripts.build: bun-tasks -r clean ::: copy:static && bun-tasks -r build:popup ::: build:player ::: build:capture ::: build:sidepanel ::: build:options ::: build:offscreen ::: build:inject ::: build:background ::: build:uno && bun run build:zip
scripts.build:report: bun run clean && bun run copy:static && bun run build:popup-report
scripts.copy:static: bun-tasks copyfiles -u 1 src/icons/* dist ::: copyfiles _locales/*/*.json dist
scripts.clean: bun-tasks rimraf dist ::: rimraf .parcel-cache ::: rimraf chromiumExt.zip ::: rimraf firefoxExt.zip
